properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used to sign and verify JWT tokens. Must be a secure and unique string in production.

properties.name: jwt.expiration-ms
properties.description: Expiration time in milliseconds for JWT tokens.

properties.name: google.books.api.url
properties.description: Google api base URL for Books API

properties.name: google.books.api.key
properties.description: Google API key for Books API
